title: Grand Theft Auto V (GTA 5) - Xbox360 & PS3 OST [FLAC]
description:
Here's, finally, the [b]complete and unfettered[/b] soundtrack of the PS3 and Xbox360 versions of Grand Theft Auto V.

All tracks were ripped from an original DVD from .awc format to separate .wav tracks, then joined on a stereo track and converted in .flac without any loss in quality.

[*] However, due to the size of such soundtrack, the developers used a 16bit-32KHz format, which is a lesser range than a standard CD format (16bit-44,1 or 48KHz). So don't worry if the music doesn't sound perfectly natural and if you feel some kind of 'FM sound', it's normal and inevitable.
[*] Secondly, most of the stations are separated into tracks, but some weren't, so I didn't cut them up, I left the mix ; it's the case for Soulwax FM, FlyLo FM, Worlwide fM (2 tracks) and East Los FM.
[*] In order for the anchorman to speak flawlessly within the tracks, some intros and outros are shortened. I don't think there's any original edit here.
[*] I couldn't convert the anchorman's interventions seperately, so you'll only hear him in the mixes.

Finally, I added all the advertisments and all the news randomly played on the radio stations. 

All tracks are tagged and folder pictures are included.

Enjoy!
